attributes.action: review all penalty fines on families travelling for childcare during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Authorities and citizens may not have been fully aware of Government guidance and in the interests of fairness all fines imposed during lockdown should be reviewed
attributes.background:
Many reasonable citizens may have had fines imposed during lockdown when travelling for essential purposes to ensure adequate child care.

Government should review all penalty fines imposed on families travelling for childcare purposes during lockdown

rejection.details:
Issuing and reviewing fines would be a matter for the police, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for fines to be reimbursed:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322542
